{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Meraki |model=Mini |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/14/2006 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Delta Networks |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mesh node |fcc_id=UDX-MERAKI-MINI |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=7.5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=ns |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2315A |cpu1_cspeed=180 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=25P64V6P |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V561620CTP-H |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2315A |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot=RedBoot; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.16-meraki-mini; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=meraki |default_ssid_regex=^meraki$ |default_ip=192.168.85.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:18:0A |oui_eth=00:18:0A }} "MINI v1 (http://www.meraki.net/)" and "2976264801" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Default settings are per the FCC manual. They may not be accurate.. ==Additional external links== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/meraki/mini On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] *[http://www.sown.org.uk/wiki/Meraki On the '''SOWN''' Wiki] ==Serial== ===Pinout=== 
  
JP1
   [3.3] (RxD) (TxD) (GND)
